pages.title: Kamen Rider Nishiki
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Hibiki And The 7 Senki (2005, movie)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:hibiki/devices/nishikidriver)Ongekiko (Nishiki)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed$(li)Resistance II$(li)Water Breathing$(li)Haste IV$(li)Fire Resistance$(li)Strength
